definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Here we can see the detail of the error.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏我們可以看到錯誤的明細。

sentences.english: The overall BOM Publishing process has four main steps , which are illustrated below .
sentences.chinese: 公佈明細表的過程統共有四個步調，如下圖所示。

sentences.english: Detailed account is the basis of the formation of accounting information.
sentences.chinese: 明細賬是會計資料形成的基礎環節。

sentences.english: She is used to recording everyday receipts, and expenditures on in a minute account book.
sentences.chinese: 習慣於把每天的收入和支出都記錄在明細賬上。

sentences.english: A function to update the detail form with the read data set is called.
sentences.chinese: 調用用讀取的數據集更新明細表的函數。

sentences.english: Subsidiary accounts should be set up for prepaid expenses according to different types of expenses.
sentences.chinese: 待攤費用應按費用種類設置明細賬，進行明細覈算。

sentences.english: Subsidiary accounts should be set up for prepaid expenses according to different types of expenses.
sentences.chinese: 待攤費用應按費用種類設置明細賬，進行明細覈算。

sentences.english: This page must be created in a separate location from the detail pages.
sentences.chinese: 這個頁面必須與明細頁面創建在不同的位置。

sentences.english: Your statement is telly to our Smart ledger.
sentences.chinese: 你的聲明是電視我們的智能明細帳。

sentences.english: Where can I get a list of all those duty-free goods?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪裏可以拿到免稅商品的明細表呢？

sentences.english: Assist A/P to balance all supplier ledgers and to prepare aging list.
sentences.chinese: 協助應付帳部結清所有的供應商明細帳並準備帳齡表。

sentences.english: You are right. You'd better use a subsidiary account, the start-up expenses.
sentences.chinese: 是的，你最好設一個明細賬戶，開辦費。

sentences.english: The list of Valued Addets in an integral part of this certificate.
sentences.chinese: 鑑定明細表》爲本證書不可分割之部分。

sentences.english: And can u send me your payment details?
sentences.chinese: 能把你付款明細單發給我嗎？

sentences.english: The table below lists recommended hardware specifications.
sentences.chinese: 下表列出了被推薦硬件明細表。

sentences.english: They are also required to list their gains from stocks and property transactions.
sentences.chinese: 同時還要求列清其股票和產權交易所得明細收益。

definition: to kill two birds with one stone (idiom)
